svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/28.1.2 Chrome/138.0.7204.243 Electron/37.4.0 Safari/537.36" version="28.1.2"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="JrFknHJHxVdyT8_KWAcq"> <mxGraphModel dx="1647" dy="639" grid="0" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="0" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" background="none" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="3s4cD8Fam__VJ9MO_Zjl-4" value="<font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">make sure that it's switch on and the the battery's working |</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="60" width="405" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zZ570xTJSwxiv8Kvg7Ka-2" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">Well, you plug the microphone in this socket in the back |</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="30" width="385" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uaw-aOKHzE1apjnC2yEl-4" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">B:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-25" y="30" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Wgi1cOvFl_QGQgytR8ZY-10" value="<font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">Then you press the play button and the pause button at the same time |</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="90" width="485" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Wgi1cOvFl_QGQgytR8ZY-25" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">A:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-25" y="190" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Wgi1cOvFl_QGQgytR8ZY-26" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">... but make sure you don't move this switch.</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="190" width="305" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-1" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">A:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-25" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-2" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">So how do I make a recording with this?</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" width="275" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-3" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">A:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="380" y="30" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-4" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">MMM</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="30" width="40" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-7" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="445" y="30" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-8" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="445" y="50" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="465" y="30" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-9" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">|</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="470" y="30" width="10" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-10" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">and you</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="30" width="60" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-11" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">A:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="60" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-12" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">RIGHT</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="420" y="60" width="45" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-13" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="475" y="60" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-14" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="475" y="80" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="495" y="60" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-15" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">|.</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="500" y="60" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-16" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">A:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="90" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-17" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">OKAY</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="500" y="90" width="45" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-18" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="545" y="90" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-19" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="545" y="110" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="565" y="90" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-20" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">|</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="570" y="90" width="10" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-21" value="<font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">and then check the recording level is okay |</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="120" width="295" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-23" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">A:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="120" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-24" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">UHUH</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="120" width="45" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-25" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="120" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-26" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="360" y="140" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="380" y="120" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-27" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">|. You can change it</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="385" y="120" width="135" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-28" value="<font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">using this dial here |</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="150" width="145" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-30" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">A:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="135" y="150" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-31" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">I SEE</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="155" y="150" width="40" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-32" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="150" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-34" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="200" y="170" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="220" y="150" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-35" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">|. And then when you're ready you just ...</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="225" y="150" width="280" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-36" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">B:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-25" y="220" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-37" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="220" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-38" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">RIGTH</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="220" width="45" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-39" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="50" y="220" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="70" y="240" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-40" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">. What does it do?</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="70" y="220" width="130" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-41" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">A:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-25" y="250" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-42" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">It changes the voltage setting.</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="250" width="205" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-43" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">B:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-25" y="280" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-44" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">I SEE</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="280" width="45" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-46" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="280" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-47" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="40" y="280" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="60" y="300" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="F3_S6dyoPo34D3_EjYo_-48" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">. And what would happen exactly?</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="280" width="230" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 403px; height: 1px; padding-top: 70px; margin-left: 22px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: make sure that it's switch on and the the battery's working |

switch.text: make sure that it's switch on and the the battery's working |

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 383px; height: 1px; padding-top: 40px; margin-left: 22px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

font.span: Well, you plug the microphone in this socket in the back |

switch.text: Well, you plug the microphone in this socket in the back |
